data.title: FH JOANNEUM
data.meta_description: An der FH Joanneum studiert man praxisbezogen, projektorientiert und interdisziplinär – sie bietet Bachelor- und Masterstudiengänge an.
data.text:
Study your dream

Wide range of programmes and excellent career opportunities

FH JOANNEUM is one of the leading universities of applied sciences in Austria, with over 50 bachelor and master degree programmes, some 5000 students and 260 partner universities across the world. Our six Departments – Applied Computer Sciences; Engineering; Building, Energy & Society; Health Studies; Media & Design; Management – provide excellent preparation for the world of work.

Practice-focused and project-oriented studies

FH JOANNEUM offers students sound academic training – our programmes are practice-oriented, project-based and interdisciplinary. In other words, we work in close cooperation with business and industry to put acquired knowledge into practice, we develop innovative solutions for topical issues in applied research projects and forge links to related disciplines.

Individual support and job opportunities around the world

Our university’s large network enables students to complete internships with leading companies and institutions in Austria and abroad and spend a semester studying at one of over 200 partner universities around the world. Teaching is conducted in small teams, which means that students receive individual support from experienced lecturers. Together with intercultural skills, students at FH JOANNEUM also acquire soft skills and advanced knowledge of foreign languages, which in combination with their specialist know-how open up excellent career opportunities for key positions in Austria and abroad.

Award-winning applied research

As a university of applied sciences FH JOANNEUM acts as a driver of innovation in research for the benefit of society. True to its motto “from idea to implementation“ it gives students the opportunity to put theory into practice in innovative projects. They regularly receive awards and prizes for their achievements which reflect the broad spectrum of our research activities and the high standard of education.

Lifelong learning

FH JOANNEUM offers ten postgraduate master courses in the areas of engineering, health, media and management as well as a qualification course for university entrance, opening the opportunity for people without a secondary school leaving certificate to study at university. Our continuing education activities are complemented by numerous lecture series, symposia, e-learning programmes and workshops.

Our Departments

Applied Computer Sciences: We connect people and systems.

Building, Energy & Society: We design tomorrow’s living spaces.

Engineering: We focus on innovative mobility and sustainable production.

Health Studies: We care about people’s health.

Management: We invest our expertise in international business success.

Media & Design: We shape the media and design of the future.

Follow us on facebook: www.facebook.com/fhjoanneum
